keys: must always be enclosed in double quotes
strings: Hellø, wørld. All unicode is allowed, along with "escaping".

objects.comment: Most of your structure will come from objects.
array: Arrays can have anything in them.

another object.comment: These things can be nested, very useful.

alternative style.comma position: doesn't matter, if it's before the next key, it's valid

that was short: And done. You now know everything JSON has to offer.
